attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: MenuModel instance to create menus programmatically.
attribute.name: model

attribute.description: Style of main container element.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of main container.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Index of the active tab. Default is 0.
attribute.name: activeIndex

attribute.description: Defines whether items would be clickable or not. Default is true.
attribute.name: readonly

attribute.description: Current step of the workflow.
attribute.name: currentStep

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Label of the component.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: An actionlistener to process when command is executed.
attribute.name: actionListener

attribute.description: A method expression or a string outcome to process when command is executed.
attribute.name: action

attribute.description: Boolean value that determines the phaseId of the action event, when true actions are processed at "Apply Request Values", when false at "Invoke Application" phase.
attribute.name: immediate

attribute.description: Url to be navigated when menuitem is clicked.
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: Target type of url navigation.
attribute.name: target

attribute.description: Style of the menuitem label.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: StyleClass of the menuitem label.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Javascript event handler for click event.
attribute.name: onclick

attribute.description: Client side id of the component(s) to be updated after async partial submit request.
attribute.name: update

attribute.description: Component id(s) to process partially instead of whole view.
attribute.name: process

attribute.description: Javascript handler to execute before ajax request is begins.
attribute.name: onstart

attribute.description: Disables or enables the menu item.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: Javascript handler to execute when ajax request is completed.
attribute.name: oncomplete

attribute.description: Javascript handler to execute when ajax request fails.
attribute.name: onerror

attribute.description: Javascript handler to execute when ajax request succeeds.
attribute.name: onsuccess

attribute.description: Global ajax requests are listened by ajaxStatus component, setting global to false will not trigger ajaxStatus.
attribute.name: global

attribute.description: If less than delay milliseconds elapses between calls to request() only the most recent one is sent and all other requests are discarded. The default value of this option is null. If the value of delay is the literal string 'none' without the quotes or the default, no delay is used.
attribute.name: delay

attribute.description: Defines the timeout for the ajax request.
attribute.name: timeout

attribute.description: When set to true, ajax requests are not queued.
attribute.name: async

attribute.description: Specifies submit mode.
attribute.name: ajax

attribute.description: Path of the menuitem image.
attribute.name: icon

attribute.description: Position of the icon, default value is right.
attribute.name: iconPos

attribute.description: When enabled, only values related to partially processed components would be serialized for ajax instead of whole form.
attribute.name: partialSubmit

attribute.description: If true, indicate that this particular Ajax transaction is a value reset transaction. This will cause resetValue() to be called on any EditableValueHolder instances encountered as a result of this ajax transaction. If not specified, or the value is false, no such indication is made.
attribute.name: resetValues

attribute.description: If true, components which autoUpdate="true" will not be updated for this request. If not specified, or the value is false, no such indication is made.
attribute.name: ignoreAutoUpdate

attribute.description: Title text of the menuitem.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Used to resolve a navigation case.
attribute.name: outcome

attribute.description: Whether to include page parameters in target URI. Default is false.
attribute.name: includeViewParams

attribute.description: Identifier of the target page which should be scrolled to.
attribute.name: fragment

attribute.description: Disable appending the on the rendering of this element.
attribute.name: disableClientWindow

attribute.description: Style of the menuitem container.
attribute.name: containerStyle

attribute.description: StyleClass of the menuitem container.
attribute.name: containerStyleClass

attribute.description: Selector to use when partial submit is on, default is ":input" to select all descendant inputs of a partially processed components.
attribute.name: partialSubmitFilter

attribute.description: Form to serialize for an ajax request. Default is the enclosing form.
attribute.name: form

attribute.description: Defines whether value would be escaped or not, defaults to true.
attribute.name: escape

attribute.description: Defines the relationship between the current document and the linked document.
attribute.name: rel

attribute.description: Defines the limitDuration
attribute.name: limitDuration

attribute.description: Defines the current duration
attribute.name: duration

attribute.description: Defines wether the current duration should be displayed
attribute.name: showDuration

attribute.description: Defines if the curent step was problematic
attribute.name: problematic

attribute.description: Defines if the curent step was executed
attribute.name: executed

attribute.description: Defines if the curent step was executed
attribute.name: failed
